description.value: This extension is used to augment a reference with the target profile, in cases when Reference.type is not precise enough to determine the functional counterpart of the reference. The value of this extension is the canonical url that uniquely identifies the target profile.

copyright.value: Copyright and related rights waived via CC0, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

definition.value:
The expected profile of the target of the reference.
The TargetProfile is the Canonical URL of profile Definition that is the profile this reference refers to.

comment.value: This element is used to indicate the profile of the target of the reference in cases when the Reference.type is not precise enough to determine the functional counterpart of the reference element. This may be used which ever of the other elements are populated (or not). In some cases, the profile of the target may be determined by inspection of the reference (e.g. a RESTful URL) or by resolving the target of the reference; if both the TargetProfile and a reference is provided, the reference SHALL resolve to a resource of the same TargetProfile as that specified.
